decision_conditions: The installation of velux cabrio balcony & glazed panel in the front elevation apex would not constitute a non-material amendment to the original planning permission ref. 213806FUL dated 06/08/2021. As such, the proposed change would not  fall within the remit of Section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow installation of Velux cabrio balcony & glazed panel in the front elevation apex in relation to planning permission reference 213806FUL dated 06/08/2021 for 'Excavation of a basement to ground floor flat, associated lightwells to front and rear including rear balustrade to stairwell access, alterations to ground floor rear elevation, changing doorway opening to window and reducing existing doorway'
